 	Dear Deyan Valkanov	
 	
You are receiving this message regarding your Caterpillar connected asset(s), that allow you to remotely monitor your machine. To enable this capability the machine transmits data to Caterpillar. In order for telematics data to continue to be transmitted to Caterpillar we will require your authorization.	
 	
Collecting telematics data directly from your asset will enable you to take advantage of multiple products and services, such as: 

*	Machine health diagnostics and data applications, as outlined in the Caterpillar Data Governance Statement <http://url6252.cat.com/ls/click?upn=W-2FbA-2BLrv-2F4C8MGV7Cf48EXESrDcmSquf8AaF3YRxsmfLVXaA2i9zHSw4o6EiKhnjFqfaI7p59-2FTwM0T6X1LdwsT8Fw8QfCFuJfWJ02sBuQUzG8rWNHdm8eIhgnaKD-2FbOQ3kJ_UoLuXS7osvAZ5L53Vp-2BM-2BCHfGLn5h1DntUTz-2FK85mYyTEKHBVNTGRDJ2BaBReb-2F9F5amOnV4y1rKeXgd6RFwMWuD9qmLFcB1ovzIS-2Ba-2BugBdnX8XH-2BDQrAkBdaJkfdK8m6JCSdArh-2BTjXTAZW8s3fBBKjlNdl1XzaXVMUFwtNj1qJgubYQFHOzIOr7phtCEocJDUx-2FZcdXtC8XlEdCLNDYM3y6NtXud2qElSNIWL0HZRMB7oemQTBR5Jl5KQrXFY> .
*	Remote access, program and install updates and/or upgrades to telematic devices on your assets, in accordance with the Remote Services Process Document <http://url6252.cat.com/ls/click?upn=W-2FbA-2BLrv-2F4C8MGV7Cf48ETRdVsXp6cww-2Fp9CCko7pmKiNkJjW5meLiUgm3kIxZHGCqsGZ9ZnXc3aOHRtOwjSF8t-2BB7YB-2Bo85P-2FcT0iYmSO4-3DGw5P_UoLuXS7osvAZ5L53Vp-2BM-2BCHfGLn5h1DntUTz-2FK85mYyTEKHBVNTGRDJ2BaBReb-2F9Lz-2BUznYMuiRQrYljH5sUiryn6Sp7wIxr6X3vkpg7OuTNao3tNST7kpLQiPZ-2F4dr2PoX7VPrsRsqdLexAkaQEUv3sAjgFAC-2B3Iz5AyldDqVYdk5G47ZzpNemoYHL3lBhimekWjvR7Cldhz5X3mqOfqMX9Bm4cl4G5W4rURaIM6OodYukfykv0XYZA2PynEkBg> .
*	Subscriptions to Caterpillar’s fleet management services which will enable smarter operational, maintenance and repair decision that will improve efficiency and decrease downtime.

 	
Company acknowledges and agrees to data transmission to Caterpillar via devices installed on Company equipment or by other means as currently outlined and described in the DGS <http://url6252.cat.com/ls/click?upn=W-2FbA-2BLrv-2F4C8MGV7Cf48EXESrDcmSquf8AaF3YRxsmfLVXaA2i9zHSw4o6EiKhnjFqfaI7p59-2FTwM0T6X1LdwsT8Fw8QfCFuJfWJ02sBuQUzG8rWNHdm8eIhgnaKD-2FbOvNoQ_UoLuXS7osvAZ5L53Vp-2BM-2BCHfGLn5h1DntUTz-2FK85mYyTEKHBVNTGRDJ2BaBReb-2F9QpDsn7B2Z0xkKs-2BPHMjHsDVUbJVcBlLHXV9Ydh2J81Jw4ppDYVWf3ooH1w9ZdbM-2BKuPt54u7na9s-2BUeQFt-2BJKtMCnYaKPTpVw3MhNJJoeKvO-2Bi-2BYM9wzdv3N7JIp0WT6dT-2F9x9asGMbD0EQFn-2FboCkGmcKObx12NaMkfDWGNppUfYPdEICGTmXD1TjtlnN5c> ., and grants to Caterpillar the right to collect, use, and share such information, including to its Distribution Networks or other affiliates, in accordance with the Caterpillar DGS <http://url6252.cat.com/ls/click?upn=W-2FbA-2BLrv-2F4C8MGV7Cf48EXESrDcmSquf8AaF3YRxsmfLVXaA2i9zHSw4o6EiKhnjFqfaI7p59-2FTwM0T6X1LdwsT8Fw8QfCFuJfWJ02sBuQUzG8rWNHdm8eIhgnaKD-2FbOMXQz_UoLuXS7osvAZ5L53Vp-2BM-2BCHfGLn5h1DntUTz-2FK85mYyTEKHBVNTGRDJ2BaBReb-2F9OLni08-2Fu5RfLvC9PZk83aMduCwmtrtLLAh3mLrnxRnP8BIwAu6s1ioq6Vx83G7-2B1I2GVZD-2B5jO5gJxEc8uV-2FVo4frKL9-2FFw43bpISWnOFBoSIIhyWnR1rldGnkhGgGYQJjZtMmY5Is0kdox6nKLt18skliHFLNn2H-2FlwSIW0Hej-2B83zhbnTGLvsUWtMgkbXM> . Company’s authorization also applies to any data and information previously collected by Caterpillar.	
 	
	
	
Company acknowledges and agrees to participate in Remote Services (including, remote diagnostics and remote updates and upgrades) and authorizes Caterpillar to remotely access, program, and install updates and upgrades for Company’s Assets and Devices in accordance with the RSP <http://url6252.cat.com/ls/click?upn=W-2FbA-2BLrv-2F4C8MGV7Cf48ETRdVsXp6cww-2Fp9CCko7pmKiNkJjW5meLiUgm3kIxZHGCqsGZ9ZnXc3aOHRtOwjSF8t-2BB7YB-2Bo85P-2FcT0iYmSO4-3DaubS_UoLuXS7osvAZ5L53Vp-2BM-2BCHfGLn5h1DntUTz-2FK85mYyTEKHBVNTGRDJ2BaBReb-2F9ZtZ4AhuMpbiKxpk2xHlIM-2BjODI5VTsH8Y5OYQSUUwvbtZ6PrmGZ5LC8KizyRavWbhskdqd5qmXYkLdYv8j3yHtWn8oqArvvK953lPCnBXv7IbDT-2FVlgMdNgulzkwG2216Wfhvph0SuVJTgz2ya-2B2BAW4uBTpaaxmDAo46Y-2FCNNCWFUA-2Bk-2FubTNVsrsH1xGDs>  Document.

Please note: This email is a notification only. Please do not reply. If you have any questions regarding this request, please contact your local Cat dealer, or Caterpillar directly at CatDigitalSupport@cat.com <mailto:CatDigitalSupport@cat.com> .	
 	
Thank you for choosing Caterpillar!
